be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.collaborator

Class NotificationsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.collaborator.NotificationsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationsViewController.Listener

    public class NotificationsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements NotificationsViewController.Listener
    This is the invitationAnsweredController. It handles the invitations that have been answered by the collaborators that have been invited by the inviter (actual user application).

        public void addProjectsInvitations(java.util.List<Project> projectsAccepted,
                                   java.util.List<Project> projectsRefused,
                                   java.util.List<Project> projectsWaiting)
                            throws DatabaseException,
                                   ConnectionFailedException
        Adds the projects invitations answered into the view.
        Parameters:
        projectsAccepted - the list of projects invited
        projectsRefused - the list of projects refused
        projectsWaiting - the list of projects that has not answered yet
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if an error occurs during the access in the database
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

      • closeButtonAction

        public void closeButtonAction()
                       throws DatabaseException,
                              ConnectionFailedException
        Description copied from interface: NotificationsViewController.Listener
        The close button action of the view. It will deletes the rows with all the projects that have been refused. It will also update the invitation read column of the rows that have been read for the first time to 1.
        Specified by:
        closeButtonAction in interface NotificationsViewController.Listener
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if an error occur during the fetching of the sql query
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
